alert.note: Alert for Adams (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ADAMS COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roseland, or 12 miles southwest of Hastings, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hastings and Juniata around 440 PM CDT. Hansen around 445 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
